function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased exploitation of resources leading to climate change","Impact":"Health complications and compromised immunity to diseases","Mitigation":"Reduce greenhouse gas emissions and optimize resource usage","Technologies":"Renewable energy, energy-efficient transportation","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Congested urban areas due to rapid population growth","Impact":"Increased vector-human interaction and potential for VBDs","Mitigation":"Sustainable land use planning and urban design","Technologies":"Urban green spaces, sustainable building materials","People":"Urban residents","Owner":"City planning departments"},{"Description":"Increase in warm or hot days coupled with flooding","Impact":"Increased breeding sites for mosquito larvae","Mitigation":"Flood prevention and water management","Technologies":"Flood barriers, urban drainage systems","People":"Residents in flood-prone areas","Owner":"Local government"}]}
